3. Trump has been nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize
4. Lily Allen Marries David Harbour
5. All whites playing in England

items.title: News Bulletin: Labour have promised to make Matariki a public holiday
items.content:
News Bulletin Presented by Charlotte Aitken

1.  Labour have promised to make Matariki a public holiday
2. California 3 large wild fires continues to burn
3. Family of missing man from a cattle ship says the Government isn't doing enough
4. Hong Kong Police received criticism
5. All Black Brandon Ennor faces 9 months on the sideline

items.title: News Bulletin: A police officer has been shot in Northland
items.content:
News Bulletin presented by Rachel Knight 
1. A police officer has been shot in Northland 
2. A child who flew from NZ to Japan has tested positive for Covid19.
3. Water has been discovered on the moon. 
4. Ariana Grande releases 6th studio album.
5. Paul Bogba claims to take legal action over false reports.

items.title: News Bulletin: Top news stories for the week.
items.content:
News Bulletin presented by Rachel Knight. 

1. New Zealand has its first new case of Covid19 community transmission.
2. One third of all isolation facilities remain empty since July. 
3. Victoria, Australia, set to relieve lockdown restrictions. 
4. Julie Walters has decided to retire from acting. 
5. Dame Valerie Adams hires new coach.

items.title: Slaine News 22.09.20
items.content:

2. Leaders debate NZ
3. Female teacher of the year nominees in a Russian region face embarrassment after footage was leaked of them enthusiastically touching a “phallic-like” glass trophy at a prize-giving contest.
4. Jacinda Ardern revealed she had a soft spot for the Marvel Comics character Deadpool 
5. Mitre 10 Cup as All Blacks
